message: Let's be fair, 60% for me seems reasonable since I'm the one making the first offer.
Your turn Alice. I'm proposing a more balanced split this time - 55% for me and 45% for you. Let's avoid the risk of getting nothing in the end.
Since I've already lost 20% of the value, I'll take a bit more this time. Still a good deal for you, Bob!
The clock is ticking, Alice. I'm offering you 400,000 -  it's more than you would have gotten last round if you had accepted my offer.  Let's be realistic and close this deal.
I know I'm losing value, but I still think I deserve more than 40%. Meet me in the middle, Bob!
Alice, time is literally money in this game - and you're losing it fast. I'm offering you 350,000. Take it before it shrinks even further!
I'm not giving up yet! I'll take a bit less, but I still think I can get a better deal than what you're offering.
